title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When I open a Java editor in Photon and right click on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu appears to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
EB: I expect a popup menu to appear when I right click on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor in Photon, allowing me to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. This should cause a popup menu to appear, with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc. However, in Photon, no popup menu is displayed.
